name: Cat Maid Castle
description:
Synopsis

College-student Colt stops by at a "Cat Maid" branded castle coffee outlet and is unknowingly approached by Audrey, a classmate with a dispute. However, when a dark turn throws their world upside down, they find themselves in a complex full of unintelligible creatures - all working tirelessly to serve their Master.

Colt soon meets Mikah, a cat maid herself who was locked up for blasphemy and agrees to help him. As they try to find an exit, they aren't the only beings roaming this eerie castle. Will Colt and Audrey learn the truth and escape, or succumb to the feline apocalypse?

Information

The game currently only has Act 1. Two more acts are planned and may be completed based on feedback.

F5 to toggle fullscreen. F6 to change window size.
